mongod/datadir.description: The full path to the directory where mongodb should store it's data files

mongod/logfile.description: The full path to a file where MongoDB will write logs

mongod/port.description: Accept connections on the specified port

mongod/bind_ip.description: Accept connections on the interface with the given IP, or 0.0.0.0 for all

mongod/small_journal_files.description: Sets the "smallfiles" configuration option.  When set to false (the default) an additional 3379MB (or more) disk space will be consumed for journal files.  Journaling is enabled by default for 64bit platforms

recipes.mongod::default: Sets up defaults for the mongod cookbook, and stores a resource to use for locking/unlocking while backing up with block_device
recipes.mongod::apt: Installs mongodb from the net10 official packages
recipes.mongod::lock_for_backup: Locks the mongo server from writes so that a consistent backup can be made
recipes.mongod::unlock_for_backup: Unlocks the mongo server for writes after a backup has been completed
